ny: "Ponena za pulogalamu ya katemera, kuyambira pa 15 March, 2022, mlingo wachitatu wa 159,628 waperekedwa mpaka pano. Kampeni ya katemera wa dziko lonse ya blitz idzayamba Lolemba, 21 March, 2022, ndipo boma [la] likulimbikitsa omwe sanapatsidwebe katemera kuti agwiritse ntchito mwayi umenewu kuti achite zimenezo," adatero Ndlovu.

en: A number of Zimbabweans have refused vaccination, saying they do not trust the mainly donated Chinese-made Sinopharm and Sinovac vaccines. The country has lately recorded a rise in new infections – now cumulatively at 244,012 with 5,418 deaths, according to the Johns Hopkins University, which is tracking the global outbreak.
ny: Anthu angapo a ku Zimbabwe akana katemera, akumati sakhulupirira katemera wa Sinopharm ndi Sinovac woperekedwa makamaka wa ku China. Dzikoli posachedwapa lalemba kukwera kwa matenda atsopano - tsopano onse pa 244,012 ndi imfa 5,418, malinga ndi Johns Hopkins University, yomwe ikutsatira mliri wapadziko lonse.

en: Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, president of Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, attributes that to the recent lifting of restrictive measures, such as lockdowns. He says, however, it is not time to panic, just to enforce WHO protocols, such masking and social distancing.
ny: Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, mtsogoleri wa bungwe la Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, akuti ndi chifukwa cha kuchotsedwa kwaposachedwapa kwa njira zoletsa, monga kutsekedwa. Komabe, iye akuti si nthawi yochitira mantha, kungokhazikitsa ndondomeko za WHO, kubisa koteroko ndi kutalikirana ndi anthu.

en: "After relaxing measures, it is expected that cases will slightly go up. But I also think that it is too early to make any meaningful conclusions, I think it is just an opportunity for us to strengthen our preventative measures and continue highlighting to the rest of the population that COVID is still with us. The good news, though, is that severe cases have not gone up. What we need to do is to continue to get vaccinated and what is important is that the government should – as it is doing – is monitor these numbers. There is no cause for alarm or cause for us to introduce new measures," Chimbetete said.
ny: "Pambuyo popuma miyeso, akuyembekezeka kuti milandu idzakwera pang'ono. Koma ndikuganiziranso kuti ndi nthawi yoyambirira kupanga mfundo iliyonse yopindulitsa, ndikuganiza kuti ndi mwayi chabe kuti tilimbitse njira zathu zopewera ndikupitiriza kuwunikira kwa anthu ena onse kuti COVID idakali nafe. Komabe, uthenga wabwino ndi wakuti matenda aakulu sanachoke. Chomwe tiyenera kuchita ndikupitirizabe kupatsidwa katemera ndipo chofunika ndi chakuti boma liyenera – monga momwe likuchitira – ndikuyang'anira manambala amenewa. Palibe chifukwa choopseza kapena chifukwa choti tiyambitse njira zatsopano," adatero Chimbetete.

en: Zimbabwe had a target of vaccinating at least 10 million people by the end of last year, a figure that some say was difficult to reach given the scarcity of resources and hesitance. It has yet to announce when it plans to achieve herd immunity.
ny: Zimbabwe inali ndi cholinga chopatsa katemera anthu osachepera 10 miliyoni kumapeto kwa chaka chatha, chiwerengero chomwe ena amati chinali chovuta kukwaniritsa chifukwa cha kusowa kwa chuma ndi kuzengereza. Sichinalengezebe pamene chikukonzekera kukwaniritsa chitetezo cha gulu.

en: Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year
ny: Finland Inavala Mtundu Wosangalala Kwambiri Padziko Lonse kwa Chaka Chachisanu

en: Finland has been named the world's happiest country for the fifth year running, in an annual U.N.-sponsored index that again ranked Afghanistan as the unhappiest, followed closely by Lebanon.
ny: Finland yatchedwa dziko losangalala kwambiri padziko lonse lapansi kwa chaka chachisanu, mu index yothandizidwa ndi UN pachaka yomwe kachiwiri inaika Afghanistan kukhala yosasangalatsa kwambiri, yotsatiridwa kwambiri ndi Lebanon.

en: Serbia, Bulgaria and Romania recorded the biggest boosts in wellbeing. The largest falls in the World Happiness table, released on Friday, came in Lebanon, Venezuela and Afghanistan.
ny: Serbia, Bulgaria ndi Romania adalemba zowonjezera zazikulu kwambiri mu ubwino. Kugwa kwakukulu kwambiri patebulo la World Happiness, lomwe linatulutsidwa Lachisanu, linabwera ku Lebanon, Venezuela ndi Afghanistan.

en: Lebanon, which is facing economic meltdown, fell to second from last on the index of 146 nations, just below Zimbabwe.
ny: Lebanon, yomwe ikuyang'anizana ndi kugwa kwa chuma, inagwera pachiwiri kuchokera komaliza pa index ya mayiko 146, pansi pa Zimbabwe.

en: War-traumatized Afghanistan, already bottom of the table, has seen its humanitarian crisis deepen since the Taliban took power again last August.  U.N. agency UNICEF estimates one million children under five could die of hunger this winter if not aided.
ny: Afghanistan yomwe ili ndi nkhondo, yomwe ili kale pansi pa tebulo, yawona vuto lake lachithandizo likukula kuyambira pamene a Taliban anatenganso ulamuliro mwezi wa August watha.  Bungwe la U.N. la UNICEF likuyerekezera kuti ana miliyoni imodzi osakwanitsa zaka zisanu angafe ndi njala m'nyengo yozizira ino ngati sakuthandizidwa.

en: "This (index) presents a stark reminder of the material and immaterial damage that war does to its many victims," co-author Jan-Emmanuel De Neve said. The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.
ny: "Izi (index) zimapereka chikumbutso chachikulu cha zinthu ndi zowonongeka zopanda pake zomwe nkhondo imachita kwa anthu ake ambiri," wolemba wina Jan-Emmanuel De Neve adati. Lipoti la World Happiness Report, lomwe tsopano lili m'chaka cha 10, likuchokera pa kuwunika kwa anthu pa chimwemwe chawo, komanso deta ya zachuma ndi chikhalidwe.

en: It assigns a happiness score on a scale of zero to 10, based on an average of data over a three-year period. This latest edition was completed before the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
ny: Imapereka chiwerengero cha chimwemwe pamlingo wa zero mpaka 10, potengera pafupifupi deta pazaka zitatu. Kope laposachedwapa limeneli linamalizidwa Dziko la Ukraine lisanaloŵe m'dziko la Ukraine.

en: Northern Europeans once again dominated the top spots -- with the Danes second behind the Finns, followed by the Icelandic, the Swiss and the Dutch. The United States rose three places to 16th, one ahead of Britain, while France climbed to 20th, its highest ranking yet.
ny: Anthu akumpoto kwa Ulaya kachiwiri ankalamulira malo apamwamba - ndi a Danes achiwiri kumbuyo kwa a Finns, motsatiridwa ndi Icelandic, Swiss ndi Dutch. United States idakwera malo atatu ku 16th, imodzi patsogolo pa Britain, pamene France idakwera ku 20th, malo ake apamwamba kwambiri.

en: As well as a personal sense of wellbeing, based on Gallup polls in each country, the happiness score takes account of GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.
ny: Komanso lingaliro laumwini la ubwino, lochokera ku kafukufuku wa Gallup m'dziko lililonse, chiwerengero cha chimwemwe chimalingalira za GDP, chithandizo cha anthu, ufulu waumwini ndi milingo ya ziphuphu.

en: This year the authors also used data from social media to compare people's emotions before and after the Covid-19 pandemic. They found "strong increases in anxiety and sadness" in 18 countries but a fall in feelings of anger.
ny: Chaka chino olembawo adagwiritsanso ntchito deta kuchokera ku chikhalidwe cha anthu kuti ayerekezere malingaliro a anthu asanayambe ndi pambuyo pa mliri wa Covid-19. Iwo anapeza "kuwonjezeka kwamphamvu kwa nkhawa ndi chisoni" m'mayiko 18 koma kugwa kwa malingaliro a mkwiyo.

en: "The lesson of the World Happiness Report over the years is that social support, generosity to one another and honesty in government are crucial for wellbeing," report co-author Jeffrey Sachs wrote.
ny: "Phunziro la World Chimwemwe Report pa zaka ndi kuti chithandizo chikhalidwe, kuwolowa manja kwa wina ndi mzake ndi kuona mtima m'boma n'kofunika kwambiri kuti bwino," lipoti co-mlembi Jeffrey Sachs analemba.

en: "World leaders should take heed."
ny: "Atsogoleri a dziko ayenera kusamala."

en: The report raised some eyebrows when it first placed Finland at the top of its listings in 2018.
ny: Lipotilo linadzutsa nsidze zina pamene linayamba kuika Finland pamwamba pa mindandanda yake mu 2018.

en: Many of the Nordic country's 5.5 million people describe themselves as taciturn and prone to melancholy, and admit to eyeing public displays of joyfulness with suspicion.
ny: Ambiri mwa anthu 5.5 miliyoni a dziko la Nordic amadzifotokozera okha ngati taciturn komanso okonda chisoni, ndipo amavomereza kuti akuyang'ana zowonetsera pagulu za chisangalalo ndi kukayikira.

en: But the country of vast forests and lakes is also known for its well-functioning public services, ubiquitous saunas, widespread trust in authority and low levels of crime and inequality.
ny: Koma dziko la nkhalango zazikulu ndi nyanja limadziwikanso chifukwa cha ntchito zake zogwira ntchito bwino za boma, saunas ubiquitous, kukhulupirira kwambiri ulamuliro ndi kuchepa kwa upandu ndi kusiyana.
